pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cellular Automata // Create cellular automata from 'Wolfram' rules. Allows the creation of 'Wolfram' style plots, as well as of animations. Easy to create multiple plots, for example the output of a rule with different initial states, or the output of many different rules from the same state. The output of a cellular automaton is given as a matrix, making it easy to try to explore the possibility of predicting its time evolution using various statistical tools available in R. Wolfram S. (2002, ISBN:1579550088) "A New Kind of Science".
